definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: prob. a tree or bush; juniper ? (Ar. 9ar9arun juniper (or cypress ? v. Lane), so Tristr:NHB 358 Rob:BR ii. 124; on format. v. Lag:BN 162 Ba:NB 160);—[[עֲרוֹעֵר בַּמִּדְבָּר]] Je 48:6, + Je 17:6, where rd. prob. [[עֲרׂעֵר בָּעֲרָבָה]] (for MT [[עַרְעָר]]; > Gf al. conversely, rd. [[עַרְעָר]] Je 48:6).
